attributes.title: Honestly A Dissapointment
attributes.review: I was told that a gorgeous man would come to my doorstep after downloading this, but as always, the creators are just dissapointments. 100% do not get this app, its horrible and it lies :((((

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: This app freezes my phone every time I open it. Some major updates are needed.

attributes.title: App reviews
attributes.review: overall bad app, makes your phone crash, not informative, trump doesn’t need a whole app anyways #getitofftheappstore

attributes.title: Sad
attributes.review: I got this app thinking it would be good and useful, but turns out it isn’t and a lot of stuff is wrong with the app in general. It’s not worth being on the App Store!!!!

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: Right as I downloaded the app and opened it, it hacked me and took all my information it’s just the worst for anybody. Wouldn’t wish this upon my worst enemy 🤮

attributes.title: 🦋🌈🧚‍♂️ Not the app for me 🦄🌸💛
attributes.review: Okay I’m not satisfied 😏 this makes my stomach ache and I’m not even pregnant 🤰 I’m disgusted with all the 🍊 people who support this 😜 you can fix it by deleting it from the App Store 💛💛💛

attributes.title: horrible!!!
attributes.review: i did not like this app as it was not HELPFUL AT ALL and plus i didn’t even bother going on it because i knew it wouldn’t work that is all

attributes.title: This app didn’t meet my standards
attributes.review: I really dislike this app. Very confusing and boring. Didn’t enjoy it one bit. This app shouldn’t be on here, it’s useless:((

attributes.title: To our wonderful “🧡🍊Orange🍊🧡”
attributes.review: This app was just not for me it is racist I don’t like how it functioned it is to laggy and spams a LOT it keeps sending links and that’s what I have to say about this app❤️🥰

attributes.title: not good
attributes.review: I got the app because I wanted to see his plans for elections, etc. and it is the worst app. Not organized and just overall not informative.
